sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Pokemon({data}) { return(

{data.name.toUpperCase()}

Poke ID: {data.id}

Poke Type 1: {data['types']['0']['type']['name']}

{data['types']['1'] ?

Poke Type 2: {data['types']['1']['type']['name']}

:null}

Speed: {data['stats']['0']['base_stat']}

Special Def: {data['stats']['1']['base_stat']}

Special Atk: {data['stats']['2']['base_stat']}

Defense: {data['stats']['3']['base_stat']}

Attack: {data['stats']['4']['base_stat']}

Starting HP: {data['stats']['5']['base_stat']}

) } export default Pokemon;
